Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Flap extension asymmetry. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Cargo Handling component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 07/01/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy
